attributes.action: make it compulsory to teach all religons in school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All religions should be taught in school, not just the mainstream, paganism should be included, along with all the others that are left out. If the government cant see that, then ALL religions should be banned

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
